医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，创伤性脑损伤后的抑郁症可能与其他原因引起的抑郁症不同由麻省总医院布莱根妇女医院 (Brigham and Women's Hospital) 的医学博士 Shan Siddiqi 领导的一项新研究表明，创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 后的抑郁症可能是一种临床上独特的疾病，而不是传统的重度抑郁症。对患者治疗有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Depression-after-TBI-may-not-be-the-same-as-depression-lated-to-other-causes-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Depression-after-TBI-may-not-be-the-same-as-depression-lated-to-other-causes-study-suggests.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44571aec-0e02-448d-8bc1-1826253fbe5f Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:20:00 -0400 Depression after TBI may not be the same as depression related to other causes, study suggests
报告对英国人如何度过时间进行了精彩的洞察英国国家统计局 (ONS) 的一份新报告以引人入胜的细节揭示了我们在三月份如何度过的，一位领先的测试专家表示这不健康！英国人每天花两个小时看电视，超过 45 分钟浏览电脑和设备，但只有 20 分钟进行健身活动，这比新冠疫情最严重时要少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Report-gives-fascinating-insight-into-how-Brits-spend-their-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Report-gives-fascinating-insight-into-how-Brits-spend-their-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63d02e9e-ba85-48cf-8783-fde223003960 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:13:00 -0400 Report gives fascinating insight into how Brits spend their time
PrecisionLife 授权 OXEGENE 数据集开发子宫内膜异位症的个性化治疗方法PrecisionLife 是一家领先的科技生物公司，致力于复杂慢性疾病的精准医疗，今天宣布与牛津大学达成数据访问协议，获得牛津子宫内膜异位症基因 (OXEGENE) 数据集的许可，旨在为子宫内膜异位症患者开发新的个性化治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/PrecisionLife-licenses-OXEGENE-dataset-to-develop-personalized-treatments-for-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/PrecisionLife-licenses-OXEGENE-dataset-to-develop-personalized-treatments-for-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95243f2e-bd60-46a8-8561-0dc8a118e2c7 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:01:00 -0400 PrecisionLife licenses OXEGENE dataset to develop personalized treatments for endometriosis
新研究表明循环抗胰岛素 CD4 T 细胞反映抗胰岛免疫的进展在《科学转化医学》最近发表的一项研究中，研究人员分析了分化 4 阳性 (CD4+) T 淋巴细胞的抗原特异性辅助簇，以确定小鼠和人类之间的抗胰岛自身免疫。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/New-study-shows-circulate-anti-insulin-CD4-T-cells-reflect-progression-of-anti-islet-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/New-study-shows-circulate-anti-insulin-CD4-T-cells-reflect-progression-of-anti-islet-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=725408d0-9d3e-4889-a62e-349ef231750a Sun, 09 Jul 2023 21:29:00 -0400 New study shows circulating anti-insulin CD4 T cells reflect progression of anti-islet immunity
B 细胞和雄激素如何促进 PCOS 的发展研究人员评估了 B 细胞频率在多囊卵巢综合征发病机制中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/How-B-cells-and-androgens-contribute-to-the-development-of-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/How-B-cells-and-androgens-contribute-to-the-development-of-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18521a11-24a4-4c7f-9185-0083a706958a Sun, 09 Jul 2023 21:20:00 -0400 How B-cells and androgens contribute to the development of PCOS
严重 COVID-19 期间 T 细胞反应延长不会导致长期 COVID即使在康复数月后，重症 COVID-19 患者仍观察到持续的免疫激活和细胞因子水平升高。然而，免疫激活和长期新冠症状之间的相关性似乎是独立的，这表明还有其他因素影响疾病的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Prolonged-T-cell-response-during-severe-COVID-19-does-not-contribute-to-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Prolonged-T-cell-response-during-severe-COVID-19-does-not-contribute-to-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52297e88-fcfc-4957-ba7b-276abef59344 Sun, 09 Jul 2023 21:14:00 -0400 Prolonged T-cell response during severe COVID-19 does not contribute to long COVID
英格兰与 COVID-19 相关的儿科住院人数令人震惊在英格兰，大多数与 SARS-CoV-2 相关的儿童和青少年入院都是由于 SARS-CoV-2 或 SARS-CoV-2 是一个促成因素。这些结果应该为未来的公共卫生举措和研究提供信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Alarming-pediatric-hospital-admissions-linked-to-COVID-19-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Alarming-pediatric-hospital-admissions-linked-to-COVID-19-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cec59443-fd91-44fc-95e7-97071641bbe6 Sun, 09 Jul 2023 20:59:00 -0400 Alarming pediatric hospital admissions linked to COVID-19 in England
智能手机应用程序在 COVID-19 大流行期间的重要作用在 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 大流行之初，用于聚合酶链反应 (PCR) 检测的鼻咽拭子样本等模拟技术很受欢迎。口罩和社交距离等非药物干预措施 (NPI) 的广泛使用让人想起 1918 年的流感爆发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/The-vital-role-of-smartphone-apps-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/The-vital-role-of-smartphone-apps-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a47b56f-000b-4a88-8998-e2d4f5a3e0ef Sun, 09 Jul 2023 20:43:00 -0400 The vital role of smartphone apps during the COVID-19 pandemic
独特的植物提取物混合物具有有效的抗痤疮功效研究人员通过抗菌评估和体外分析评估了 FRO（一种由发酵漆树和山竹组成的配方）对抗痤疮发病机制的功效。 FRO被发现含有没食子酸、非瑟酮、槲皮素和山奈酚等酚类物质，并被确定可以通过抑制痤疮皮肤杆菌的生长、炎症和过多的皮脂来缓解痤疮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Unique-plant-extract-mixture-has-pot-anti-acne-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Unique-plant-extract-mixture-has-pot-anti-acne-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3daca1ef-f446-4cba-bebc-3a40781c2081 Sun, 09 Jul 2023 00:24:00 -0400 Unique plant extract mixture has potent anti-acne effects
欢呼还是谨慎？研究人员质疑饮酒的潜在好处研究论文讨论了饮酒与健康之间的关系，特别是 J 形关联。虽然一些研究表明存在这种关系，但最近的研究由于研究设计和个体差异的限制而对其提出了挑战。该文件还强调了考虑替代性健康促进策略以及饮酒对社会/人口水平有害影响的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Cheers-or-caution-Researchers-question-the-pottial-benefits-of-alcohol-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Cheers-or-caution-Researchers-question-the-pottial-benefits-of-alcohol-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f76251a9-dfbf-4489-b85d-2cc233299f45 Sun, 09 Jul 2023 00:17:00 -0400 Cheers or caution? Researchers question the potential benefits of alcohol consumption
